document_data.caption: A map showing Watchers' Cape in northwest Threskel.
document_data.name: Watchers' Cape
document_data.mainbody: '''Watchers' Cape''' was a protrusion of land into the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] located in the country of [[Threskel]] in the [[Old Empires]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: Watchers' Cape sat on the eastern side of the mouth of the [[Bay of Chessenta]] in northwest Threskel.
document_data.Notable Locations: The [[Drakelight]], a massive lighthouse garrisoned by soliders form [[Soorenar]], [[Luthcheq]], and [[Mordulkin]], sat along the the tip of Watchers' Cape.
